title: Can't redeem Dreadknight Garen
body:
I have tried to redeem the garen skin through twitter but when i redeem it "Pay now" button it says that there was a problem fulfilling my store items. I tried a couple days back but seems that it does not work. It would be very nice if you could help me. Thank you.

Best regards

replies.body: No worries! I've got that skin added onto your account now ^_^
Hello i have tried to redeem the same skin via twitter but it said the same thing. I hope that you can help me too. Thank you!

I have tried to redeem the garen skin through twitter but when i redeem it "Pay now" button it says that there was a problem fulfilling my store items. I tried a couple days back but seems that it does not work. It would be very nice if you could help me. Thank you.

Best regards
